attributes.action: I want the government to acknowledge the Chinese Muslims in concentration camps.
attributes.additional_details:
The Muslims in these concentration camps suffer day in day out they are being force fed pig meat, forced to drink alcohol, praising their leader Xi Jinping by singing songs hours on end. 

This is how it all began for the Jews, it has been going on for 9 years and it’s getting out of hand. They are building “educational camps” that strip people of their faith and their religion. 

For those who don’t oblige they are cremated (burnt alive)! They do this to get rid of any evidence and questions.
attributes.background:
Currently in China there is concentration camps holding Muslims prisoner and torturing them because of their faith. You may be thinking why is the government not doing anything about this? Well China have controlled the media and the story from getting out. 
Let’s get the government to take action.
